General.Name: Hunan Jiudian Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Hunan Jiudian Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells pharmaceutical products in China and internationally. Its leading products are loxoprofen sodium gel plaster and hydrochloric acid. The company offers its products in the anti-inflammatory and analgesic, anti-infective, anti-allergic, digestive system, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular, gynecological drugs, supplements, and other fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Building A1, Shibuya Science and Technology Industrial Park, Changsha, China, 410329
